statements: UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'Meeting' WHERE interaction_id = 1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_notes = 'Follow-up call scheduled' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE interaction_id = 2;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type='Meeting', interaction_notes='Discussed new project details' WHERE interaction_id=1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_date='2022-08-15' WHERE customer_id=5;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_notes='Followed up on proposal' WHERE interaction_id=3;
UPDATE Calls SET duration_minutes = 30 WHERE call_id = 1;
UPDATE Emails SET subject = 'RE: Regarding Your Order' WHERE email_id = 2;
UPDATE Calls SET customer_id = 1001 WHERE call_id = 3;
UPDATE Calls SET duration_minutes = duration_minutes + 10 WHERE call_date = '2022-08-25' AND customer_id = 123;
UPDATE Emails SET body = CONCAT('Update: ', body) WHERE email_date = '2022-08-25' AND customer_id = 456;

UPDATE Calls, Emails SET Calls.duration_minutes = Calls.duration_minutes + 15, Emails.subject = CONCAT('Re: ', Emails.subject) WHERE Calls.customer_id = Emails.customer_id AND Calls.call_date = '2022-08-26' AND Emails.email_date = '2022-08-25';
UPDATE calls SET call_duration = 30 WHERE call_id = 1;
UPDATE emails SET email_content = 'Updated content' WHERE email_id = 2;
UPDATE meetings SET meeting_notes = 'Follow up action items' WHERE meeting_id = 3;
UPDATE calls SET call_duration = call_duration + 10 WHERE call_id = 101;
UPDATE emails SET email_subject = 'Updated Subject' WHERE email_id = 201;
UPDATE meetings SET meeting_notes = CONCAT(meeting_notes, ' - Follow-up action items discussed') WHERE meeting_id = 301;
UPDATE Calls SET call_duration = 30 WHERE call_id = 101;
UPDATE Emails SET email_subject = 'Updated Subject' WHERE email_id = 201;
UPDATE Meetings SET meeting_duration = 60 WHERE meeting_id = 301;
UPDATE Calls SET call_duration = 60 WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE Emails SET email_subject = 'Important Update' WHERE customer_id = 102;
UPDATE Meetings SET meeting_duration = 90 WHERE customer_id = 103;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE emails SET email_subject = 'New Subject' WHERE email_id = 3;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE interaction_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE emails SET email_subject = 'Important Update' WHERE email_id = 123;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'Feedback' WHERE interaction_id = 456;
